name: JsonRenderTest
description: Unit tests for the JsonRender class, ensuring that rendering does not fail under specific conditions.

test_cases.name: renderDoesNotFailWhenPropertyHasBeenRemoved
test_cases.description: Tests that rendering does not fail when a property has been removed from the OpenAPI specification.

test_cases.name: renderDoesNotFailForJsr310Types
test_cases.description: Tests that rendering does not fail when dealing with JSR310 types in the OpenAPI specification.
